textos_fuente.text: About - Bushnell Motorsports Park Florida's premier karting facility is ready for you! Have questions? Call us 352-568-0778 Menu Home Facility Our Track Hours & Events Calendar Live Timing and Scoreboard Online Store Purchase Gift Cards Sponsor With Us! Rental Karts Adult Rental Karts Hours and Pricing Jr Rental Karts Hours and Pricing Saturday Morning League Thursday Night Thunder Endurance Racing 2025 12 Hour Endurance Race Kart Owners Privateer Hours and Rates Margay Ignite 206 Karts 2025 Championship Kart Series Karts, Engines and Accessories for Sale Bike Owners Privateer Hours and Rates Group Events Group Events FAQ’s Close Home | About [mp_heading mp_style_classes=”light” margin=”none,0,none,none”] Who we are [/mp_heading] [mp_text] Located off I-75 (Exit 314) in Bushnell, FL (Central FL), Bushnell Motorsports Park features a 2/3 mile asphalt track with a bridge and an underpass, making it the only competition kart track in a nation with these features. The track is used for high-speed rental karts, competitive kart racing, competitive SuperMoto and Grom racing, privateer practice time, as well as arrive-and-drive kart racing leagues, kart racing schools, corporate events, private parties, and much more. [/mp_text] [mp_text] Looking for a unique place to race? Look no further. Whether you own your own kart/bike and want a place to play or if you are looking for some intense high-speed fun with your friends on our rental karts, Bushnell Motorsports Park is the place for you. Looking for directions? Go west off I-75 on Exit 314 and we are only 1/2 a mile down the road! We are about 45 minutes south of Ocala, 45 minutes north of Tampa and 45 minutes west of Orlando. [/mp_text] [mp_heading mp_style_classes=”light” margin=”none,0,none,none”] A High-Speed Motorsports Experience [/mp_heading] [mp_text] This is NOT your kiddie, amusement style racing. This is REAL racing. REAL action. REAL high-speeds on a REAL track with the perfect mixture of technical turns and fun straight-aways. [/mp_text] [mp_heading mp_style_classes=”light” margin=”none,0,none,none”] Our advantages [/mp_heading] [mp_list list_type=”icon” use_custom_text_color=”false” text_color=”#000000″ icon=”fa fa-angle-right” use_custom_icon_color=”true” icon_color=”#fc5a0a”] Our Track – You will find nothing like it in the nation. With several layout options, an oval, a bridge and underpass and a banked turn in the back, this unique track will allow you to race in a way never-before experienced. [/mp_list] [mp_list list_type=”icon” use_custom_text_color=”false” text_color=”#000000″ icon=”fa fa-angle-right” use_custom_icon_color=”true” icon_color=”#fc5a0a”] Our Staff – Our staff is trained to be professional, friendly and helpful, all while keeping the racers safe. Our staff will do their best to provide a fun, informative and safe experience for all of our patrons. [/mp_list] [mp_list list_type=”icon” use_custom_text_color=”false” text_color=”#000000″ icon=”fa fa-angle-right” use_custom_icon_color=”true” icon_color=”#fc5a0a”] Our Karts – We wanted the general public to be able to race on REAL racing karts. They will reach speeds of 50-55mph with their 9.5 hp Honda Engines. These are NOT electric karts. You can hear the engine rumble. We do NOT “slow you down electronically” as other tracks do. [/mp_list] [mp_list list_type=”icon” use_custom_text_color=”false” text_color=”#000000″ icon=”fa fa-angle-right” use_custom_icon_color=”true” icon_color=”#fc5a0a”] Our Facility – We have 6,400 square feet of air conditioned space for spectators to watch the races from. This includes our waiting area (with screens to show the current races lap times, and windows to view the racing), as well as a meeting room for any sort of private event, corporate meeting, driver school or catered event. We also have a covered grid, plenty of viewing space outside to watch the racing, as well as a Pit Area for competition races finished with restrooms, a shower, registration building, a flag stand, rentable garages and more. [/mp_list] Hours Rental Karting Open Wednesday through Sunday Click here for our owner kart/bike  and rental kart hours. Contact Us 5821 Pit Road Bushnell FL 33513 352-568-0778 info@bushnellmotorsportspark.com Stay up-to-date! Home Privacy Policy Terms of Service Site Map Contacts Copyright © 2015-2025 Bushnell Motorsports Park . All Rights Reserved.

Bushnell Motorsports Park Facility - Bushnell Motorsports Park Florida's premier karting facility is ready for you! Have questions? Call us 352-568-0778 Menu Home Facility Our Track Hours & Events Calendar Live Timing and Scoreboard Online Store Purchase Gift Cards Sponsor With Us! Rental Karts Adult Rental Karts Hours and Pricing Jr Rental Karts Hours and Pricing Saturday Morning League Thursday Night Thunder Endurance Racing 2025 12 Hour Endurance Race Kart Owners Privateer Hours and Rates Margay Ignite 206 Karts 2025 Championship Kart Series Karts, Engines and Accessories for Sale Bike Owners Privateer Hours and Rates Group Events Group Events FAQ’s Close Home | Bushnell Motorsports Park Facility Bushnell Motorsports Park Facility Looking for a unique place to race? Look no further. Whether you own your own kart/bike and want a place to play or if you are looking for some intense high-speed fun with your friends on our rental karts, Bushnell Motorsports Park is the place for you. Track Location: Bushnell Motorsports Park is located on Exit 314 off I-75 in Bushnell, FL. Head west about 1/2 a mile once you get off I-75, and Bushnell Motorsports Park will be on your right. From Tampa, we are about 40 minutes north. From Ocala, we are about 40 minutes south. From Orlando, we are about 40 minutes west. The Track: Bushnell Motorsports Park features a 2/3 mile asphalt race track that is used for our high-speed rental karts, competitive kart racing, competitive SuperMoto / Grom racing, privateer owner practice time, as well as arrive-and-drive kart racing leagues, kart racing schools, Endurance Racing, corporate events, private events, private lessons and more. The track contains a bridge and an underpass, 17 turns (one of which is banked), making it the only competition kart track in the nation with these features. You will find nothing like it in the nation. With several layout options, an oval, a bridge and underpass and a banked turn in the back, this unique track will allow you to race in a way never-before experienced. The Facility: The main building on-site is a 9,600 sqft space for rental karts. We have our main office, rental kart registration, a waiting area, the viewing screens for the live timing, a meeting room for corporate events, private events, driver schools or catering and the covered grid for the rental karts. The pit area of the facility has a 2-story scoring tower that has registration as well as bathrooms / shower for public use. We have the pit area for people’s trailers and tents, as well as rentable garage space for people who would like to keep their equipment on-site. The pit area / competition side of the facility has its own pit on and pit off and a scoring line also. Bushnell Motorsports Park Staff – Our staff is trained to be professional, friendly and helpful, all while keeping the racers safe. Our staff will do their best to provide a fun, informative and safe experience for all of our patrons. Bushnell Motorsports Park Rental Karts – We wanted the general public to be able to race on REAL racing karts. They will reach speeds of 40-45 mph with their 9.5 hp Honda Engines. These are NOT electric karts. You can hear the engine rumble. We do NOT “slow you down electronically” as other tracks do. Bushnell Motorsports Park Experience – We have 6,400 square feet of air conditioned space for spectators to watch the races from. This includes our waiting area (with screens to show the current races lap times, and windows to view the racing), as well as a meeting room for any sort of private event, corporate meeting, driver school or catered event. We also have a covered grid, plenty of viewing space outside to watch the racing, as well as a Pit Area for competition races finished with restrooms, a shower, registration building, a flag stand, rentable garages and more. Hours Rental Karting Open Wednesday through Sunday Click here for our owner kart/bike  and rental kart hours. Contact Us 5821 Pit Road Bushnell FL 33513 352-568-0778 info@bushnellmotorsportspark.com Stay up-to-date! Home Privacy Policy Terms of Service Site Map Contacts Copyright © 2015-2025 Bushnell Motorsports Park . All Rights Reserved.

Bike Owner Track Time - Bushnell Motorsports Park Florida's premier karting facility is ready for you! Have questions? Call us 352-568-0778 Menu Home Facility Our Track Hours & Events Calendar Live Timing and Scoreboard Online Store Purchase Gift Cards Sponsor With Us! Rental Karts Adult Rental Karts Hours and Pricing Jr Rental Karts Hours and Pricing Saturday Morning League Thursday Night Thunder Endurance Racing 2025 12 Hour Endurance Race Kart Owners Privateer Hours and Rates Margay Ignite 206 Karts 2025 Championship Kart Series Karts, Engines and Accessories for Sale Bike Owners Privateer Hours and Rates Group Events Group Events FAQ’s Close Home | Bike Owner Track Time Bike Owners at Bushnell Motorsports Park As of 9/1/2024 all bike riders need to be 7 years of age or older. A legal parent or guardian must be present to sign for anyone under the age of 18. Download Minor Waiver *Note* This minor waiver is different from the rental kart minor waiver. Make sure you have the correct one! If you are having trouble downloading, try switching browsers. Own a bike / supermoto / grom, mini moto, etc? You can bring it out to practice at the Bushnell Motorsports Park race track. We have time allotted 7 days a week for you to bring your bike out to practice and play on the track. Privateer Bike Owner Track Time allows you to test your bike, try out different track layouts, and hone in your riding skills. Bikes under 600cc are welcome at BMP for Owner Track Time. We do not have any noise restrictions, but we do like to be polite to our neighbors. We do ask that you take all actions that will help reduce extra noise. We all know that the louder it is, the faster it is, but after a point it just becomes excessively loud and could lead to long term problems. We ask that you help keep BMP a place that is around for years for your bike track days by not being that extra bit of loud! NINJA Owners: Be prepared to reduce your noise. These bikes seem to be the worst in disturbing the peace. You MUST TAKE ALL ACTIONS TO MAKE THEM AS QUIET AS POSSIBLE. Be prepared to no be on track if you bike is overly loud. There is no specific DB rating, but when it rattles the walls inside a metal building… its too loud. Please contact us for any questions you might have about bike owner track time. Bike Owner Hours Click on the link below to view our bike owner hours! Before you make the trip, double check our hours because they do change often. Check Hours Here Pro Tip: First time racing at BMP? Speed up the registration process by setting up your racing profile before you arrive. Set up your racer profile here . Pricing Track Time – $50.42 Pit Pass – $15 + tax (all who enter pits must purchase pit pass, including drivers) Transponder Rental – $10 + tax (optional) Need oil or race fuel? The Track Shack can help! We have many items for sale on a daily basis. Check out our online store to see some of the items you can pre-purchase for when you come to BMP. *Note* We have many parts that are not listed in our online store, so if you don’t see what you are looking for, just give us a call and we’ll help you as best we can! Pre-order Parts, Oil and Fuel Here Safety: To practice at BMP you must… Be 7 years of age or older. All racers must have helmet, gloves, and race suit or equivalent. Please adhere to the following bike requirements, for your safety and for the safety and longevity of our track. Need a place to store your bike or trailer?! Leave your bike at BMP: $125/monthly or $1250 yearly (2 months FREE) Bike is stored inside BMP main office building.  Regular practice fee required. Leave your Trailer on site: $60/monthly or $600 yearly (2 months FREE) Your trailer is stored inside the gates of BMP. Regular practice fee required. Price per vehicle/trailer on property. Rent a Garage: $250/monthly or $2500 yearly (2 months FREE) (Currently 1 Available ) Enough space to leave 2-3 bikes and all your things. Regular practice fee required Hours Rental Karting Open Wednesday through Sunday Click here for our owner kart/bike  and rental kart hours. Contact Us 5821 Pit Road Bushnell FL 33513 352-568-0778 info@bushnellmotorsportspark.com Stay up-to-date! Home Privacy Policy Terms of Service Site Map Contacts Copyright © 2015-2025 Bushnell Motorsports Park . All Rights Reserved.

2025 24-Hour Race - Bushnell Motorsports Park Florida's premier karting facility is ready for you! Have questions? Call us 352-568-0778 Menu Home Facility Our Track Hours & Events Calendar Live Timing and Scoreboard Online Store Purchase Gift Cards Sponsor With Us! Rental Karts Adult Rental Karts Hours and Pricing Jr Rental Karts Hours and Pricing Saturday Morning League Thursday Night Thunder Endurance Racing 2025 12 Hour Endurance Race Kart Owners Privateer Hours and Rates Margay Ignite 206 Karts 2025 Championship Kart Series Karts, Engines and Accessories for Sale Bike Owners Privateer Hours and Rates Group Events Group Events FAQ’s Close Home | 2025 24-Hour Race 24 Hour Go Kart Endurance Race February 15-16, 2025 Twice around the clock is back at Bushnell Motorsports Park! This is a teamed event (1-6 racers per team) where pit stops and driver changes all play into the strategy of this action-packed race. We provide everything you need to win, you just show up!  Race package includes headsocks, helmets, go karts, practice/qualifying session, the endurance race, and awards. 16 teams available! This event will sell out so don’t wait! Pre-registration required. Racers MUST be 16+ with a drivers license. Price: $3200 + tax per team. (Payment plans are available for a fee) Register Your Team Here! Race Structure Structure: 1 hour and 30 minute Practice/Qualifying (all laps counts towards qualifying times). Grid is set by best lap time from the Practice / Qualifying session. 30 pit stops required, with kart swaps. 60 minutes max stint time, drivers can run back-to-back stints. Up to 6 people per team. Pit stop are “timed” by the team. Pit road will have 2 loops for a total time in the pit… below the minimum will result in a penalty. Any drivers under 210lbs will have weight added to the kart each stint they drive. If you are over 210lbs, no weight is needed. Drivers over 210lbs can still race. A Full Course Caution can happen – more to come on FCY’s! Pit Stop Process Video **A final set of rules will be released in late January once details are completed at BMP (timing loops installed, testing of etc). If you have questions, please call us at 352-568-0778 opt 2 or email us or send us a message on Facebook. Race Schedule Friday, February 14th – 12pm – 6pm – Open Rental Karting (Not included in entry fee) Saturday, February 15th – 10:00am – 10:45am Drivers Meeting 11:00am – 12:30pm Practice/Qualifying (all laps counts towards qualifying times) 2:00pm Green Flag Sunday, February 16th – 2:00p Checkered Flag 2:20p Awards Race Countdown Day(s) : Hour(s) : Minute(s) : Second(s) Hours Rental Karting Open Wednesday through Sunday Click here for our owner kart/bike  and rental kart hours. Contact Us 5821 Pit Road Bushnell FL 33513 352-568-0778 info@bushnellmotorsportspark.com Stay up-to-date! Home Privacy Policy Terms of Service Site Map Contacts Copyright © 2015-2025 Bushnell Motorsports Park . All Rights Reserved.

hiring - Bushnell Motorsports Park Florida's premier karting facility is ready for you! Have questions? Call us 352-568-0778 Menu Home Facility Our Track Hours & Events Calendar Live Timing and Scoreboard Online Store Purchase Gift Cards Sponsor With Us! Rental Karts Adult Rental Karts Hours and Pricing Jr Rental Karts Hours and Pricing Saturday Morning League Thursday Night Thunder Endurance Racing 2025 12 Hour Endurance Race Kart Owners Privateer Hours and Rates Margay Ignite 206 Karts 2025 Championship Kart Series Karts, Engines and Accessories for Sale Bike Owners Privateer Hours and Rates Group Events Group Events FAQ’s Close Home | hiring Join the BMP Team! BMP is growing and moving in new directions! This means we need new team members. If you are someone who strives to grow and better yourself with a company that has the same goals – we would love to talk to you! If you can do the following things, we would love to have you as a part of our team – Show up to work. Show up to work on time (and a few minutes early). Be eager to work and be punctual, and work while at work. Use moderate physical strength Not use cell phone or tobacco during work hours Be extremely polite to customers, other staff and team leaders. Have A+ customer service skills. Enforce safety rules to customers in a polite way. Firmly, yet kindly and respectfully, enforce rules and safety requirements. Follow instructions – take initiative and get tasks accomplished Can wear appropriate BMP attire during work Front counter requires 16 years old or older and Track Attendants requires 18 years old or older, with reliable transportation. Current Open Positions: Track Attendant We are looking for a highly motivated and extremely responsible individual to work as a track attendant at Bushnell Motorsports Park. Responsibilities include but are not limited to: -Flagging races (must be able to be outside for long periods of time and use moderate to heavy strength) -Ensuring customers equipment has the proper safety pieces. -Monitoring the track and making sure everyone is safe and following the rules. -Cleaning and helping maintain the facility. -Giving safety speech to racers prior to their race. Requirements: Must be 18+. Must have reliable transportation. Must have A+ customer service skills. Must be able to follow instructions. Must be eager to work. Must be punctual. Must be able to firmly, yet kindly and respectfully, enforce rules and safety requirements. Must be able to not use cell phone during work hours. Take initiative and get tasks accomplished. Wear appropriate BMP attire during work. Hours: Currently we are looking for a part time team member to fill evening and weekend shifts. ~15 hours/week. Job Type: Part-time Salary: starting pay is $15.00/ hour, pay increases do occur, paid through payroll, direct deposit bi-weekly. Part Time Front Desk Attendant / Cashier We are looking for a highly motivated and extremely responsible individual to assist part time as a Front Desk Attendant. This person could get anywhere from 15-30 hours per week, depending on the candidates preferences and availability. Responsibilities include: -Checking in customers and ensuring that they have the proper insurance waivers signed. -Ensuring customers equipment has the proper safety pieces. -Handling money and giving proper change -Cleaning the building and setting the building up for rental kart hours. This includes sweeping, cleaning the bathrooms, cleaning windows….etc. -Collecting signatures and ensuring that the customer has completed all required paperwork. Hours: The front counter position runs the following hours, divided into shifts, and shifts are shared among the front counter staff. YOU MUST BE ABLE TO WORK WEEKENDS. You will be working Wednesday to Sunday. Wednesday and Thursday: 8:00 am – 9:30 pm Friday and Saturday: 8:00 am-10:30 pm Sunday: 8:00 am – 7:30 pm Job Type: Part-time/Full Time Salary: starting pay is $14.50/ hour, pay increases do occur, paid through payroll, direct deposit bi-weekly. Positions that we are taking applications, but not hiring for: Grounds Keeper - Part Time This position is for a Grounds Keeper at BMP. We have A LOT of grounds to keep up with! It will be your job to make a lasting impression that the facility is in top notch condition.  BMP needs around 10 hours a week of work to keep the facility at a clean, sharp looking appearance during the winter months, and around 14-15 during the summer months. The large mowing job is already contracted out, so this would be weeding and edging, painting projects, sign replacement, tire barrier maintenance (shrink wrapping with a heating torch) and more. You will be responsible for, but not limited to: -Lawn maintenance (no mowing) -Edging, weed eating, grass removal, weed spraying, etc -Emptying garbage cans, cleaning them when needed -Track maintenance -Tire bundle wrapping (heat gun and shrink wrap) / straightening, sign replacement, cleaning -Painting projects -Hedge maintenance -Overall appearance of the property -Working based off a list and/or able to see the items that need attention -Must be 18+ years old. Mechanic - Full Time We have a fleet of 24 go karts that needs to be in great condition – all the time, everyday. We are looking for a kart mechanic. Duties would include weekly fleet prepping before the rental kart week begins, and working during rental kart hours to fix any problems that may occur during racing. Must adequately prepare and perform daily routine maintenance on karts. Must have go kart or small engine repair experience that includes but not limited to tire changing, small engine repair, chassis alignment, fabrication…etc. Mechanic experience is a huge plus. We also sell, store and maintain customer’s competition go karts, sell and service parts, etc. The mechanic would be in charge of managing the customer’s go karts, ensuring they are ready to go when a customer makes a reservation with their go kart, or any L0206 go kart rentals we may do. Keeping our golf carts and UTV’s running is important as well. When not performing mechanical tasks, the mechanic will also help run the grid at the track and may sometimes act as a flagger or other on track staff when needed. We are a team at BMP. We work together and take care of each other. We all pitch in when needed and are willing to go above and beyond. Please do not apply if you are not willing to do the above. YOU MUST BE ABLE TO WORK WEEKENDS. You will be working Wednesday to Sunday. Example hours: Wednesday – Thursday: 1p-9p, Friday – Saturday: 10a-10p, and Sunday 10a-7p. Apply below! Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form. Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form. Open Positions * Front Counter Front Counter Track Attendant Grounds Crew Mechanic Name * First Last Address * City * Email * Contact Number * Preferred Contact Method * Email Phone Call What days are you available to work? * Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Saturday Sunday If you are still in school, what days are you in class(es)? * I am no longer in school. Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday If you are still in school, what time do you get out of classes? If you are not in school, please say "not in school". What is the highest level of education you have earned? * Still in High School Still in High School High School/GED completion Some College College Degree Briefly explian why you would be a good fit for the position you're applying for. Work History: Please provide your previous job title and place of employement. Also include your manager's contact information, when you worked there, and a reason you left the job. Work History: If you do not have any previous work experience, please give us 2 references we can contact. Include their name, contact information, and their relationship to you. Are you a US Citizen? * Yes No Have you ever been convicted of a Felony? * Yes No This job may require weekday, weekend, and/or night time hours. Please check yes that you understand that you will be possibly be working on weekends and in the evenings. * Yes Submit Hours Rental Karting Open Wednesday through Sunday Click here for our owner kart/bike  and rental kart hours. Contact Us 5821 Pit Road Bushnell FL 33513 352-568-0778 info@bushnellmotorsportspark.com Stay up-to-date! Our Owner Track Time allows you specific hours 7 days a week to come practice on our track. We also offer on-site storage. Whatever you ride, we have several racing programs you can get involved with. Kart Owners Bike Owners High-Speed Rental Karts The Bushnell Motorsports Park high-speed rental karts offer you the experience of racing wheel-to-wheel against your friends and family. We offer high-speed karts for anyone 16+ with a drivers license (or 18+ without), and junior karts for anyone 10+. High-Speed Karts Junior Karts At Bushnell Motorsports Park, we offer racing leagues using our high-speed go karts, teamed endurance races, solo endurance races, and more! Sign up for those special events here. Online Store / Events At Bushnell Motorsports Park, we offer racing leagues using our high-speed go karts, teamed endurance races, solo endurance races, and more! Sign up for those special events here. Purchase Gift Cards The Bushnell Motorsports Park track features 16 turns, a bridge and an underpass, and a banked turn – making it the only competition go kart track in the nation with these features! Facility / Track Information At Bushnell Motorsports Park, our high-speed rental go karts offer an exhilarating experience for you, your family, and friends. Race wheel-to-wheel against each other on our full track, which includes exciting features like a bridge, underpass, and banked turn. Our go karts can reach impressive speeds of up to 40-45mph, ensuring an adrenaline-pumping adventure for all. If you are looking for things to do in the Central Florida area – Bushnell Motorsports Park’s high-speed go kart racing should be at the top of your list! Easily accessible to major cities such as Tampa, Orlando, Ocala, Gainesville, and more! Betpawa Review & Bonus Betpawa is a popular online betting platform betpawa bonus that offers a wide range of sports and casino games. It provides a user-friendly interface and a variety of bonuses to enhance the betting experience. With its secure and reliable platform, Betpawa ensures a seamless and enjoyable betting experience for its users. Planning a Visit? We always recommend to check the Bushnell Motorsports Park Event Calendar – sometimes we have special events or competition race days that might alter the normal rental kart and owner track time schedules. Bringing a Group? Bushnell Motorsports Park is Central Florida’s best place for group events, unique birthday parties, special events, car club destinations and corporate outings. We can accommodate groups from 10-several hundred. We have a private room available and special packages to make your event as FAST as can be! Everyone loves a little friendly competition. Tell your friends you will see them out on the race track! Rental Kart Leagues Do you love racing and want to get involved in one of our League series? We offer league racing using the Bushnell Motorsports Park rental go karts. Typically, each league season runs over the course of a few months and racers collect points each race that go towards end of the season awards. You can drop in for a league or sign up for the entire season. We add weight to the karts to level out the weights of the drivers to ensure a level racing field. Data: Bushnell Motorsports Park Facility: Over 25,000 rental kart races each year – your brand will be seen by every racer, every lap Several large, national events held at the track each year – with famous racers and riders from all over the world Social Side: Audience of over 25k on FB/IG combined We have many “celebrity” racers and drivers with a massive social following (100s of thousands of followers) that race on the track and post their photos/videos – do you want your logo in the background of their viral videos? Majority Demographic: Males 30-60 years old – outdoor enthusiasts with a love of motorsports Florida based, mid to high income earners Large Sign Sponsor This billboard is seen from almost our entire facility. It is on the back straightaway – a perfect photo-op spot for many of our visitors and racers. Sign size: 8×16. 1 Year Sponsorship – $6,000 + Sign Cost (Contact us to inquire on our source for signs, or use your own). Could also be split into two or four signs. Social Sponsors Take your sponsorship to the social side! Social Sponsorship includes: Monthly mentions/tags in in social media stories (25k+ audience) Logo / Company Description / Link to website on the BMP’s Sponsor Web Page Logo and website link at the bottom of at least 6 BMP email blasts each year (38k + audience) $1,500 / year Fence Banners Our fence’s are ready for your logo and banner! These fences line the BMP property and most can be seen from the race track. We will double your banner so that it can be seen from the track side as well as the spectator side. All fence sign sponsorships include a company logo, description and website link on our Sponsorship webpage as well as discounts for corporate events and social media mentions. 2 -  3x8 banners (one for track side, one for spectator side) - PLUS: 20% off a corporate event at BMP during the year 2 social media story mentions throughout the year 2 3-rental kart race packs to give to employees, customers or friends throughout the year $1,600 / year + banner cost 6 – 3×8 banners (three for track side, three for spectator side) – PLUS: 20% off a corporate event at BMP during the year 6 social media story mentions throughout the year 4 3-rental kart race packs to give to employees, customers or friends throughout the year $3,200 / year + banner cost 12 – 3×8 banners (six for track side, six for spectator side) – PLUS: 25% off a corporate event at BMP during the year 12 social media story mentions throughout the year 6 3-rental kart race packs to give to employees, customers or friends throughout the year $5500/ year + banner cost Contact us for banner production cost. Contacts - Bushnell Motorsports Park Florida's premier karting facility is ready for you! Have questions? Call us 352-568-0778 Menu Home Facility Our Track Hours & Events Calendar Live Timing and Scoreboard Online Store Purchase Gift Cards Sponsor With Us! Rental Karts Adult Rental Karts Hours and Pricing Jr Rental Karts Hours and Pricing Saturday Morning League Thursday Night Thunder Endurance Racing 2025 12 Hour Endurance Race Kart Owners Privateer Hours and Rates Margay Ignite 206 Karts 2025 Championship Kart Series Karts, Engines and Accessories for Sale Bike Owners Privateer Hours and Rates Group Events Group Events FAQ’s Close Home | Contacts Frequently Asked Questions Q: Do I need a reservation for rental karts? A: You do not need a reservation to run our rental karts. Just show up anytime rentals are racing! Q: How old do you need to be to run the rental karts? Is there a height requirement? A: You need to be 16+ with a drivers license to do the adult rental karts and 10+ to do our Jr karts. 16 and 17 year olds need to bring their license with them to the track. There is no height requirement. It is all based off of age. Q: Is there a maximum weight restriction? A: No. Everyone is built different. We always recommend that you sit in one of our karts before buying any races to see if you will be comfortable for 10 minutes at a time. You must be able to fully buckle the seatbelt. Q: Does a permit count as a drivers license? A: The State of Florida requires all racers of the adult karts to be 16+ with a drivers license. Permits do not count. If you are 16 and 17 years of age, you need to bring your license with you to the track. Q: Can adults do the Jr karts with the kids? A: Yes you can! The karts are a little smaller than the adult ones but adults can fit! Q: Can I sign the waiver for a minor who is not my own? A: No. The legal parent or guardian must sign for the minor. You can download the waiver and have it signed by the legal parent or guardian and notarized before coming to the track. Q: How long is each race? A: Adult kart races are 10 minutes long (~5-7 Laps). Jr kart races are 8 minutes long (~8-12 Laps) Q: How fast do the karts go? A: The adult karts go ~40-45mph and the Jr karts go ~30mph Q: Can I share a 3 or 5 pack of races with other people? A: No. They are for individual use. Q: What happens when it rains? A: We do not run rental karts while it is raining. We wait for the rain to stop, and then blow the puddles off the track. Once the track is deemed safe, we get back to racing. Q: Is there food on site? A: We have basic snacks and drinks for sale. Q: Do you guys run Spyder MX? A: No, we do not. All questions for Spyder can be answered on their website! Click the link! https://spyder-mx.myshopify.com/ Contact Bushnell Motorsports Park  Address / Location Bushnell Motorsports Park. 5821 Pit Road Bushnell, FL 33513  Phone Number 352-568-0778  Email info@bushnellmotorsportspark.com Can’t find the answer to your question above? Fill out the form below and we’ll get back to you soon with an answer! Your Name Your Email Subject Message Submit Hours Rental Karting Open Wednesday through Sunday Click here for our owner kart/bike  and rental kart hours. Call us 352-568-0778 Menu Home Facility Our Track Hours & Events Calendar Live Timing and Scoreboard Online Store Purchase Gift Cards Sponsor With Us! Rental Karts Adult Rental Karts Hours and Pricing Jr Rental Karts Hours and Pricing Saturday Morning League Thursday Night Thunder Endurance Racing 2025 12 Hour Endurance Race Kart Owners Privateer Hours and Rates Margay Ignite 206 Karts 2025 Championship Kart Series Karts, Engines and Accessories for Sale Bike Owners Privateer Hours and Rates Group Events Group Events FAQ’s Close Home | Kart Owners Kart Owners at Bushnell Motorsports Park As of 9/1/2024 all kart racers need to be 5 years of age or older. A legal parent or guardian must be present to sign for anyone under the age of 18. Download Minor Waiver *Note* This minor waiver is different from the rental kart minor waiver. Make sure you have the correct one! If you are having trouble downloading, try switching browsers. Own a competition go-kart? We have time allotted 7 days a week for you to bring your kart out to practice and play on the track. Privateer Go Kart Track Time allows you to test your kart, try out different track layouts, and hone in your go kart racing skills. Want more than practice time? We also host our local race series on the 3rd Saturday of each month – come out and race with us! Contact us for private coaching, lessons or any work that needs done to your go kart. Hours Click on the link below to view our owner kart hours! Before you make the trip, double check our hours because they do change often. Check Hours Here Pro Tip: First time racing at BMP? Speed up the registration process by setting up your racing profile before you arrive. Set up your racer profile here . Pricing Track Time – $41.08 + tax Pit Pass – $15 + tax (all who enter pits must purchase pit pass, including drivers) Transponder Rental – $10 + tax (optional) Need oil, parts or race fuel? The Track Shack can help! We have many items for sale on a daily basis. Check out our online store to see some of the items you can pre-purchase for when you come to BMP. *Note* We have many parts that are not listed in our online store, so if you don’t see what you are looking for, just give us a call and we’ll help you as best we can! Pre-order Parts, Fuel and Oil Here! Safety: To practice at BMP you must… Be 5 years of age or older. All racers must have helmet, gloves, race suit or equivalent, and children must have an approved chest protector. The kart needs to be maintained and prepped for track use. All karts must have: all the appropriate bodywork, like a rear bumper that covers and extends to cover the rear tires. Engines are REQUIRED to have a muffler on the engine. No open pipes. Racing style karts only. Need a place to store your kart or trailer?! Leave your kart and kart stand: $125/monthly or $1250 yearly (2 months FREE) Kart is stored inside BMP main office building. Leave a kart on a stand and anything that fits on the kart can stay! Regular practice fee required. Leave your Trailer on site: $60/monthly or $600 yearly (2 months FREE) Your trailer is stored inside the gates of BMP. Regular practice fee required. Price per vehicle/trailer on property. Rent a Garage: $250/monthly or $2500 yearly (2 months FREE) (Currently 1 Available ) Enough space to leave 2-3 karts and all your things. Regular practice fee required Get involved! Monthly Kart Racing Bushnell Motorsports Park hosts competition racing for karters. Buy a Kart Looking to get into go kart racing?
